text: hey, all. i'm using the HTML module from the marketplace. previously i was able to add HubL code to the HTML module before it became exclusive to the marketplace. now i'm seeing this error when trying to add HubL. are there any workarounds to this?
You can't use HubL in the HTML module. Instead, the alternative is to use a Custom Module to accomplish this.
will do. just wanted to confirm. thanks AJ.
then i realize, why the f*ck am i using an HTML module for this site map menu when I can just use the Menu module.  :face_palm:
